Data Fields
Vps_ScCoeff Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » VPS - Scaler Config API

Structure is used to provide application defined scaler coefficients. Scaler provides functions to configure standard coefficients as per the scaling ratio. If application wants to use its own set of coefficients, it can point the pointers in the structure to the coefficient array and call Sc_createUserCoeffOvly function to fill up coefficient memory. More...

#include <vps_cfgSc.h>

UInt16 vsChroma [VPS_SC_VERT_NUM_COEFF]
 
UInt16 vsBilinearLuma [VPS_SC_BILINEAR_NUM_COEFF]
 
UInt16 vsBilinearChroma [VPS_SC_BILINEAR_NUM_COEFF]
 

Detailed Description

Structure is used to provide application defined scaler coefficients. Scaler provides functions to configure standard coefficients as per the scaling ratio. If application wants to use its own set of coefficients, it can point the pointers in the structure to the coefficient array and call Sc_createUserCoeffOvly function to fill up coefficient memory.

struct Vps_ScCoeff

Field Documentation

UInt16 Vps_ScCoeff::hsChroma[VPS_SC_HORZ_NUM_COEFF]

Array in which horizontal polyphase filter coefficients for Chroma will be stored.

UInt16 Vps_ScCoeff::hsLuma[VPS_SC_HORZ_NUM_COEFF]

Array in which horizontal polyphase filter coefficients for Luma will be stored.

UInt16 Vps_ScCoeff::vsBilinearChroma[VPS_SC_BILINEAR_NUM_COEFF]

Array in which bilinear polyphase filter coefficients for Chroma will be stored.

UInt16 Vps_ScCoeff::vsBilinearLuma[VPS_SC_BILINEAR_NUM_COEFF]

Array in which bilinear polyphase filter coefficients for Luma will be stored.

UInt16 Vps_ScCoeff::vsChroma[VPS_SC_VERT_NUM_COEFF]

Array in which vertical polyphase filter coefficients for Chroma will be stored.

UInt16 Vps_ScCoeff::vsLuma[VPS_SC_VERT_NUM_COEFF]

Array in which vertical polyphase filter coefficients for Luma will be stored.
